member.name: BSMINFO
member.summary: Contains information about a window that denied a request from .

member.name: BSMINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: BSMINFO.hdesk
member.summary: A desktop handle to the window specified byhwnd. This value is returned only if specifies BSF_RETURNHDESK and BSF_QUERY.

member.name: BSMINFO.hwnd
member.summary: A handle to the window that denied the request. This value is returned if specifies BSF_QUERY.

member.name: BSMINFO.luid
member.summary: A locally unique identifier (LUID) for the window.
